title: United Kingdom 30-Year Treasury Gilt Auction
description: United Kingdom 30-Year Treasury Gilt Auction Bond Yield was 3.85 percent on Monday November 7, according to over-the-counter interbank yield quotes for this government bond maturity. Historically, the United Kingdom 30-Year Treasury Gilt Auction reached an all time high of 16.01 in September of 1981.
author: Department of Treasury, UK
